text: James Donald Ragland (November 12, 1940 – May 16, 2006) was an American football player and coach. He served as the head coach at Tennessee Technological University from 1986 to 1995, compiling a record of 42–66. ==Head coaching record== ==References== ==External links== * Category:1940 births Category:2006 deaths Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Ole Miss Rebels football players Category:Memphis Tigers football coaches Category:Tampa Spartans football coaches Category:Tennessee Tech Golden Eagles football coaches Category:Texas Tech Red Raiders football coaches Category:West Virginia Mountaineers football coaches Category:People from Cookeville, Tennessee
title: Jim Ragland
